name: Pancake Combo
description: Two Large Golden Fluffy Pancakes served with Two Eggs your style, Choice of Sausages, Bacon, Sausage Patty or Ham and Side of Hash Browns or Homemade Seasoned Potatoes.

name: Short Stack
description: Two Large Golden Fluffy Pancakes served with Butter

name: Cinnamon Roll French Toast
description: One of our Huge Homemade Cinnamon Rolls split into halves, egg battered and grilled until golden brown. Finished with a dusting of powdered sugar. Served with Two Sausage Links or Two Bacon or Make it a Combo
note: $14.00 to make it a combo, Add Side of Fruit for additional cost.

name: French Toast
description: Two Slices of rich and delicious Texas style Toast, with powder sugar.

name: French Toast Combo
description: Two Slices of rich and delicious Texas style Toast, Served with Two Eggs your style, Choice of Sausage Patty, Bacon, Sausage or Ham. Side of Hash Browns or Homemade Seasoned Potatoes

description: Our Traditional Golden Brown Belgian Waffle.

name: Waffle Combo
description: Our Traditional Golden Brown Belgian Waffle. Served with Two Eggs your style, Choice of Bacon, Sausage or Ham. Side of Hash Browns or Homemade Seasoned Potatoes

name: Oatmeal or Grits
description: Made by order. Served with Brown Sugar, Raisins, and Milk.

name: Eggs Benedict
description: Grilled Canadien Bacon on an English Muffin, Topped with Two Poached Eggs and Homemade Hollandaise sauce. Served with Choice of Hash Browns or Homemade Seasoned Potatoes.

name: Monte Cristo
description: Egg battered white bread is grilled until golden, filled with Swiss cheese, smoked ham and roasted turkey. Lightly dusted with powder sugar and side of raspberry jam. Side choice of Hash browns or Homemade Seasoned Potatoes.

name: The Classic
description: Two Eggs any style with Choice of Bacon, Sausage or Ham. Choice of Hash Browns or Homemade Seasoned Potatoes and your Choice of Toast.

description: Two Biscuits smothered in our Homemade Sausage Gravy served with Two Eggs any style and Side of Hash Browns or Homemade Seasoned Potatoes

name: Simple Fit

name: Country Fried Steak
description: 8 Ounces of Breaded, Well-Seasoned Steak fried until Golden. Served with Country Gravy, Two Eggs your style. Served with Side of Hash Browns or Homemade Seasoned Potatoes and Choice of Toast.

name: Steak & Eggs
description: Angus New York Steak lightly seasoned with Two Eggs your style. Choice of Hash Browns or Homemade Seasoned Potatoes and Choice of Toast.

description: Our Homemade Corned Beef Hash mixed with Freshly Chopped Onions and Homemade Style Potatoes. Served with Two farm fresh Eggs your style. Side of Hash Browns or Homemade Seasoned Potatoes and Choice of Toast.
